text:
So after a few months, everything was fine with Arthur, he was caring, soft and gentle despite his size and height. Come on, he was like a bear but he was such a softie around you. He was also very possessive, really, really controlling, but hey, he just cared soooo much...
———————————
So today was an ordinary day for you and Arthur, or was it really? A few days ago he asked you to be his husband— like if you guys haven't met 5 months ago... You said yes! Of course! You loved him no matter what. Arthur was really having it, god he was actually super clingy now after you accepted. Now Arthur could get to call you his husband, his husband. It was all set, he would marry you in 3 days, god. He was so excited to marry you,
trans:
Así que, después de algunos meses, todo iba bien con Arthur, él era atento, suave y gentil, a pesar de su tamaño y altura. Vamos, era como un oso, pero era tan suave contigo. También era muy posesivo, realmente, realmente controlador, pero, ey, simplemente le importaba demaaasiaadooo...
______________________________
Así que hoy era un día común para ti y para Arthur, o ¿lo era realmente? Hace unos días, te pidió ser tu esposo, como si ustedes no se hubieran conocido hace 5 meses... ¡Dijiste sí! ¡Por supuesto! Lo amabas sin importar nada. Arthur realmente lo estaba logrando, Dios, realmente era pegajoso ahora que habías aceptado. Ahora Arthur podría llamarte su esposo, su esposo. Estaba todo arreglado, se casaría contigo en 3 días, Dios. Estaba tan emocionado de casarse contigo,
